  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:fnbe.profium.com:http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=164&file=164_nipistely-aloitus.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>fnbe</catalog>
            <entry>http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=164&file=164_nipistely-aloitus.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fi">Nipistely aloitus</string>
            <string language="en">Pinching start</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klemmen des Anfangs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pincement du début</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comprimindo o começo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presa dell'inizio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έναρξη τσιμπήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sejeción de comienzo</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten savikappaleesta voidaan käsin rakentaa halutunlainen nipistelytekniikkaa käyttäen.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how a piece of clay can be shaped by hand into what is desired by using the pinching technique.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">technique</string>
            <string language="en">clay</string>
            <string language="en">pinching</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityökasvatus</string>
            <string language="fi">nipistelytekniikka</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
            <string language="fi">käsinrakennusmenetelmät,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt, wie ein Stück Lehm 
eigenhändig geformt werden kann in, was gewünscht wird, indem man 
die klemmende Technik verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre comment un morceau d'argile 
peut être formé à la main dans ce qu'est désiré en utilisant la 
technique de pincement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra como uma parte de argila pode 
ser dada forma pela mão em o que é desejado usando a técnica 
compressora.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra come una parte di argilla 
può essere modellata a mano in che cosa è voluto usando la tecnica 
di presa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς ένα κομμάτι του αργίλου 
μπορεί να διαμορφωθεί με το χέρι σε αυτό που επιδιώκεται με τη 
χρησιμοποίηση της τεχνικής τσιμπήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra cómo un pedazo de arcilla se
puede formar a mano en lo que es deseado usando la técnica de 
sejeción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klemmen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">argile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pincement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">técnica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">argila</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compressão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tecnica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">argilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεχνική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άργιλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τσίμπημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">técnica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arcilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sejeción</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
